title: The relaxation premium for the use of slum TDR i
clause_text: The relaxation premium for the use of slum TDR i.e.10% of normal premium shall be charged while condoning deficiencies in open spaces.
section: .1 Utilization of Transferable Development Rights (TDR ) and Road Width Relation will be govern by regulation 30 (A) subject to following notes:-

source_pdf.text_snippet: The relaxation premium for the use of slum TDR i.e.10% of normal premium shall be charged while condoning deficiencies in open spaces.
